meanings.definition: The state or quality of being foggy.
meanings.sent1: The fogginess outside made it hard to see far.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't see clearly through the fogginess of the window.
meanings.sent3: The fogginess of my memory made me forget where I put my keys.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was shrouded in a thick fogginess, clouding her judgment.
meanings.sent5: The fogginess of the forest created an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Lack of clarity or sharpness in thought or perception.
meanings.sent1: The fogginess in his mind made it hard to focus on the task.
meanings.sent2: Her confusion added to the fogginess of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The fogginess of his explanation left us all scratching our heads.
meanings.sent4: The fogginess of her understanding was like trying to see through a dense mist.
meanings.sent5: The fogginess of his thoughts cleared up after a good night's sleep.
